name: Runnin Thru' The Lab
description:
wad- jump, left, right

space- shoot

mouse- aim

In this side scrolling adventure game you encounter the most odd things. After a building explodes you will come across monsters and portals to different dimensions. Shoot the mutated animals to get past them and save yourself by maintaining a good health.

http://arcade.gamesalad.com/games/134804
